Class ErrorFeatures

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.uibk.dbis.textfeatures.features.ErrorFeatures

extends java.lang.Object

    1.0
    Author:
    Balthasar Huber

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean british 
      private java.util.Map<org.languagetool.rules.Rule,java.lang.Double> frequencyOfRules 
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> frequencyOfSuggestions 
      private TextContainer textContainer 
      private Utility ut 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ErrorFeatures(TextContainer tc, boolean british)
      ErrorFeatures-Object allows you to calculate diverse error features.
      To use Functions, you have to make a new ErrorFeature Object
      and then call calculateErrors() on it, so all Errors are loaded.
      Otherwise, you will get NullPointerExceptions.
      Error Calculation is done with LanguageTool Java Api.
      To find out what each Rule stands for, also visit this link.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ErrorFeatures

        public ErrorFeatures(TextContainer tc,
                     boolean british)
        ErrorFeatures-Object allows you to calculate diverse error features.
        To use Functions, you have to make a new ErrorFeature Object
        and then call calculateErrors() on it, so all Errors are loaded.
        Otherwise, you will get NullPointerExceptions.
        Error Calculation is done with LanguageTool Java Api.
        To find out what each Rule stands for, also visit this link.
        Parameters:
        TextContainer - - contains different representations of the text.
        british - = true, use British English
        british - = false, use American English

    • Method Detail

      • calculateErrors

        public void calculateErrors()

      • frequencyOfRules

        private void frequencyOfRules(boolean british)
        Counts the frequency of all Error Rules as well as all primary suggestions found in the text.
        Parameters:
        british - = true, use British English
        british - = false, use American English

      • getFrequencyOfRules

        public java.util.Map<org.languagetool.rules.Rule,java.lang.Double> getFrequencyOfRules(boolean normalized)
        Counts the frequency of all Error Rules found in the text.
        Parameters:
        normalized - = true - will return the frequency of the Rule proportional to 100%( 1.0 = 100%).
        = false - returns raw values;
        Returns:
        a sorted map with all Rules(K) and their frequency(V).

      • getFrequencyOfSuggestions

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> getFrequencyOfSuggestions(boolean normalized)
        Counts the frequency of all Suggestions(on position 1) found in the text.
        Parameters:
        normalized - = true - will return the frequency of the Rule proportional to 100%( 1.0 = 100%).
        = false - returns raw values;
        Returns:
        a sorted map with all Rules(K) and their frequency(V).

      • getFrequencyOfRule

        public double getFrequencyOfRule(java.lang.String ruleDescription,
                                 boolean normalized)
        Parameters:
        ruleDescription - - first Rule that contains the String ruleDescription will be returned
        Note that every Rule has an unique name.
        normalized - = true - will return the frequency of the Rule proportional to 100%( 1.0 = 100%).
        = false - returns raw values;
        Returns:
